articles.description: The Bangladesh all-rounder Shakib al Hasan received death threat on a Facebook Live video after attending Kali Puja in Kolkata.
articles.content:

articles.description: Part of the pace attack that will again be tasked to make amends for the 2-1 loss in 2018-19, Josh Hazlewood feels familiarity with the Indian batting line-up will make the job a bit easier this time.
